description.french: Atteignez le niveau 10
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello 10
description.japanese: レベル10に達する
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 10

description.brazilian: Conclua 3 Desafios de Diálogo com uma pontuação perfeita.
description.english: Complete 3 Dialogue Challenges with a perfect score
description.french: Terminez 3 Défis de conversation avec un score parfait
description.german: Schließe 3 Dialogherausforderungen mit einem perfekten Ergebnis ab.
description.italian: Completa 3 sfide di dialogo con un punteggio perfetto
description.japanese: 完璧なスコアで対話チャレンジを3回クリアする
description.russian: Выполните 3 задания на диалог с высшим баллом.
description.schinese: 以满分完成3个对话挑战
description.spanish: Completa 3 Desafíos de diálogo con una puntuación perfecta

description.brazilian: Equipe 3 Núcleos de Transistor no Falco.
description.french: Équipez Falco de 3 Noyaux de transistor
description.italian: Equipaggia Falco con tre nuclei di transistor
description.japanese: ファルコに3つのトランジスタコアを装備する
description.schinese: 为鹰眼配备3个晶体管核芯
description.spanish: Equipa a Falco con 3 Núcleos de Transistor

description.brazilian: Destranque 10 Caixas Trancadas.
description.french: Ouvrez 10 coffrets
description.italian: Sblocca 10 scrigni
description.japanese: 10個のロックボックスを解除する
description.spanish: Desbloquea 10 cajas fuertes

description.brazilian: Conclua 10 exercícios de treinamento na MTA com pontuação perfeita.
description.english: Complete 10 ATM training exercises with a perfect score
description.french: Terminez 10 exercices d'entraînement MEA avec un score parfait
description.german: Schließe 10 ATM-Übungsaufgaben mit einem perfekten Ergebnis ab.
description.italian: Completa 10 esercizi dell'addestramento nell'ATM con un punteggio perfetto
description.japanese: 完璧なスコアでATMトレーニング演習を10回クリアする
description.russian: Пройдите 10 упражнений на АОМ с высшим баллом.
description.schinese: 完成10个ATM培训演习并获得满分
description.spanish: Completa 10 ejercicios de entrenamiento en la MTA con una puntuación perfecta

description.brazilian: Conclua seu primeiro combate.
description.french: Terminez votre premier combat
description.italian: Completa il tuo primo combattimento
description.japanese: 最初の戦闘をクリアする
description.spanish: Completa tu primer combate

description.brazilian: Entre no Modo Foco duas vezes no mesmo combate.
description.english: Enter Focus Mode twice during the same combat
description.french: Entrez en Mode concentration deux fois en un combat
description.german: Erreiche in einem Kampf zweimal den Fokus-Modus.
description.italian: Entra in Modalità concentrazione due volte nello stesso combattimento
description.japanese: 同じ戦闘でフォーカスモードに2回突入する
description.koreana: 같은 전투에서 포커스 모드에 두 번 돌입합니다
description.russian: Дважды сосредоточьтесь во время одного боя.
description.schinese: 在同一战斗中两次进入“焦点模式”
description.spanish: Entra dos veces en el Modo concentración durante el mismo combate

description.brazilian: Recupere 100 pontos de Vida em combate.
description.english: Recover 100 points of Health during combat
description.french: Regagnez 100 points de Santé en combat
description.german: Stelle im Kampf 100 Gesundheitspunkte wieder her.
description.italian: Recupera 100 punti di Salute durante un combattimento
description.japanese: 戦闘中にヘルスを100ポイント回復する
description.russian: Получите 100 очков здоровья во время боя.
description.schinese: 在战斗中恢复100点生命值
description.spanish: Recupera 100 puntos de Salud durante el combate

description.brazilian: Equipe tudo que puder equipar.
description.french: Équipez-vous complètement
description.italian: Equipaggiati al completo
description.japanese: 完全に装備する
description.koreana: 장착할 수 있는 아이템을 모두 장착합니다
description.spanish: Equípate por completo

description.brazilian: Escolha 3 palavras corretas seguidas durante o minijogo do Modo Foco.
description.english: Choose 3 correct words in a row during the Focus Mode minigame
description.french: Choisissez 3 mots corrects à la suite lors du mini-jeu du Mode concentration
description.german: Wähle beim Fokus-Modus-Minispiel 3 richtige Wörter hintereinander.
description.italian: Scegli 3 parole corrette di fila durante il minigioco della Modalità Concentrazione
description.japanese: フォーカスモードのミニゲームで、3回連続で正しい単語を選ぶ
description.koreana: 포커스 모드 미니게임에서 올바른 단어를 3번 연속으로 선택합니다
description.russian: Правильно выберите 3 слова подряд во время мини-игры в сосредоточении.
description.schinese: 在“焦点模式”迷你游戏中，连续选择3个正确的单词
description.spanish: Elige 3 palabras correctas seguidas durante el minijuego del Modo concentración

description.brazilian: Evite um combate com Arkel von Camp.
description.english: Avoid combat with Arkel von Camp
description.french: Évitez de combattre Arkel von Camp
description.german: Vermeide den Kampf mit Arkel von Camp.
description.italian: Evita di combattere con Arkel von Camp
description.japanese: アーケル・フォン・キャンプとの戦闘を避ける
description.russian: Уклонитесь от боя с Аркелем фон Кампом.
description.schinese: 避免与阿尔克尔·范坎普作战
description.spanish: Evita el combate con Arkel von Camp

description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial.
description.french: Terminez le tutoriel
description.italian: Completa il tutorial
description.japanese: チュートリアルを完了する
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial
